description: The App.tsx file defines the main React component for a responsive web application that renders a themed carousel showcasing various computer services. It manages themes, slide data, and accessibility features, and imports assets and components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that applies theme, renders header, toggle button, and a Carousel with slides.

methods.name: tryResolveImage
methods.description: Attempts to require an image asset given a relative path, returning undefined if not found.

methods.name: usePrefersReducedMotion
methods.description: Custom React hook that detects if the user prefers reduced motion for accessibility.
